group_1.textLeft: Your coffee is delicious, Kako.

group_1.textRight: Coffee is still too bitter for me, so I can't speak@for the flavor myself.
But I tried out a brewing method my father@taught me...!

group_1.textLeft: Really? Well, it came out wonderfully.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*... Why, thank you. It might just be because@the beans were good, though.

group_1.textLeft: You're very good at helping people relax, aren't you?
You take the other person's feelings into@consideration, while still making sure to convey@your opinion...
And at times, you naturally pull them right into@your own pace.
Someone like you would make a great editor.

group_1.textRight: [chara:301101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Wow, that's so kind of you to say!@I really admire editing work.
Oh, but I want to try writing a book of my own, too,@and of course I want to carry on my father's work@at Natsume Books...

group_1.textLeft: I think we could have a lot of fun collaborating@on a book, some day.

group_1.textRight: ...Speaking of coffee, Lepa Macha's is quite nice,@isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Well, yes... I'd say so.
It's more of a restaurant, though, so I'd say it's@more famous for its cooking than its coffee.

group_1.textRight: I see... Say, what are things like in@Asunaro City lately?

group_1.textLeft: Which things do you mean?

group_1.textRight: Like, how many Magical Girls there are...@How safe the city is...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I see. Yes, it's a pretty dangerous city...
..."After all"?

group_1.textRight: Ah, no, um... I was just wondering if it had@a lot going on...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'd say so. It's... quite dangerous,@in a lot of ways.
It's got Witches just like this city, and death could be@around any corner.
Huh? What else could be dangerous to Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: Well... there's some in this city too, but Magical Girls@who attack fellow Magical Girls, for instance...

group_1.textLeft: ...I've heard rumors about Magical Girls like that, yes.
But it's unheard of in Asunaro City. I couldn't begin@to understand why someone would do that.
I haven't heard about any Magical Girls' tragic@deaths as of late, either.
Feeling a little more at ease?
How nice.
You're lucky I'm not one of those frightful Magical@Girl hunters.
